answers.question: What are the main ways to enter or stay in Romania?
answers.answer: The main ways to enter Romania are by obtaining temporary protection, with a short-stay right, or as an asylum seeker. You can also apply for asylum within Romania at a later point.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How do a person's rights depend on their status in Romania?
answers.answer: A person's rights in Romania depend on their status.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'My rights'.

answers.question: When does temporary protection in Romania become invalid?
answers.answer: If you are a beneficiary of temporary protection, your permit is automatically valid until 03/04/2026, and you do not need to apply for an extension. It does not become invalid before this date.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Temporary protection'.

answers.question: How can someone apply for asylum in Romania?
answers.answer: You can apply for asylum within Romania at a later point, either in writing or verbally. If you cannot present any documents upon entering Romania, you will need to apply for asylum at the border.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Applying for asylum'.
answers.read_instruction: read the section under 'Applying for asylum'.
